document_data.deathnotes: Simbul dropped a mountain on them
document_data.mainbody:
Perstur was a pit fiend  in the late 14 century DR slain by the Simbul.
In the , Perstur was one of the pit fiends under Geryon when he came after the Simbul, who was scouring Avernus in search of Elminster Aumar. Together with Agamur, he was sent directly to follow a cloud of blue fire, in which the Simbul was hiding all of the pit fiends close to it were crushed later, when a mountain crag was magically thrown on top of them all.
